open_in_editor.doc_string: Opens the given file in the configured editor, additionally navigating to the specified line & column.

args.name: path
args.doc_string: The absolute path to the file to be opened.

args.name: line
args.doc_string: The line number. Use the '$line' variable to be passed the line number of the right click.

args.name: col
args.doc_string: The column number. Use the '$col' variable to be passed the column number of the right click.

args.name: default
args.doc_string: Populates the file with the contents set in this argument, if the opened file happens to be empty.

open_dir_in_sublime_text.doc_string: Opens the given directory/repository in Sublime Text.

args.name: dir
args.doc_string: The absolute path to the directory to be opened. Use the '$dir' variable to open the current repository.
